major.description: 6 semester credit hours of upper-division Visual and Performing Arts electives: Students may select any combination of upper-division courses in Art History, Communication, Dance, Film Studies, Music, Theatre, Visual Art, and/or Visual and Performing Arts.
6 semester credit hours of Major Related courses: Students may select any combination of upper-division courses from the School of Arts and Humanities.
